=== CHAPTER 1 ===
[SCENE: CH01_S01]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
The virus is engineered.

[SCENE: CH01_S02]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

[SCENE: CH01_S04]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

=== CHAPTER 2 ===
[SCENE: CH02_S01]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
Sarah is the mole.

word30 word31 word32 word33 word34 word35 word36 word37 word38 word39 word40 word41 word42 word43 word44 word45 word46 word47 word48 word49 word0 word1 word2 word3 word4 word5 word6 word7 word8 word9 [SCENE: CH02_S02]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

[SCENE: CH02_S04]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

=== CHAPTER 3 ===
[SCENE: CH03_S01]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.

[SCENE: CH03_S02]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

[SCENE: CH03_S04]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

=== CHAPTER 4 ===
[SCENE: CH04_S01]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.

[SCENE: CH04_S02]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

[SCENE: CH04_S03]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.

[SCENE: CH04_S04]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

=== CHAPTER 5 ===
[SCENE: CH05_S01]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.

[SCENE: CH05_S02]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.

[SCENE: CH05_S03]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.

[SCENE: CH05_S04]
Suddenly, an alarm blared! Is there a danger? The gun case was open. Blood on the floor. Siren outside. A knock. Chase begins. Threat detected.
"We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B. "We have to move now," said A. "Stay low," replied B.
